plot: Math teacher Kōhei Inuzuka is a widower with a young daughter named Tsumugi. Inuzuka isn't adept in the kitchen but with the help of his student Kotori Iida and his daughter, he embarks on a culinary adventure. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Harebare Fanfare" (晴レ晴レファンファーレ; "Bright Fanfare") by Mimi Meme MIMI
